text: Patient reports persistent dry cough and mild chest tightness three weeks after starting lisinopril. No signs of infection. Suspect ACE inhibitor–induced cough. Plan to switch to ARB.

A 42-year-old male developed progressive blurred vision and facial numbness after 8 weeks on metronidazole for Crohn’s disease. MRI revealed cerebellar atrophy. Symptoms resolved upon cessation. Metronidazole neurotoxicity should be considered in long-term use.
Has anyone else experienced intense itching and weird skin crawling sensations on Cymbalta? My doctor says it’s unrelated, but it started exactly two days after I began taking it.
67-year-old with chronic amiodarone use presenting with bluish skin discoloration and photosensitivity. Rare but documented adverse effect. Patient advised sun protection and dose adjustment.
Been on clonazepam for years. Now I feel like it’s not working at all, but if I skip a dose I get terrible dizziness and brain zaps. Is this normal?

A 10-year-old female with ADHD and concurrent nocturnal enuresis showed full symptom resolution on atomoxetine. Authors suggest norepinephrine reuptake inhibition may improve bladder control via spinal modulation.
